alert.note: Alert for Gates (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton, northwestern Hertford, northwestern Gates and southeastern Southampton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Murfreesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Como around 155 PM EDT. Roduco around 215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Riddicksville, Pendleton, Sunbeam, Severn, Bartonsville, Riverdale, Topsy, Wyanoke, Barretts Crossroad and Dort. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
